title: 修改器错误创造模式闪退
txt_content:
[10:42:54] [launcher/INFO]: Setting user: Billlave_Chi
[10:42:56] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.1
[10:43:08] [Client thread/ERROR]: Couldn't initialize twitch stream
[10:43:26] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[10:43:29] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[10:43:41] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures/blocks-atlas
[10:43:42] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 256x256 textures/items-atlas
[10:43:43] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default, LiteLoader, VoxelMap, Mouse Tweaks
[10:43:45] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures/blocks-atlas
[10:43:46] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 256x256 textures/items-atlas
[10:43:47] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[10:43:58] [Client thread/INFO]: Stopping!

replies.author: fuckwuzui
replies.txt_content: 应该是修改器问题，你去下个新的吧
